availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram Barney (New York attorney and customs collector)

body.p: New York attorney and customs collector. Jefferson County, New York, native. Graduated from Union College in Schenectady, New York, 1834. Attorney. Customs Collector of the Port of New York.

ab.bibl:
The American Annual Cyclopaedia and Register of Important Events of the Year 1862, vol. 2, (New York: D. Appleton & Company, 1867), 756.
DeAlva Stanwood Alexander, A Political History of the State of New Yor, vol. 2 (New York: Henry Holt and Company, 1906), 395-397.
